yuddhayen pasu mema idam labadunnada ema idamwala kisidu sanwardhanayak ho idikirimak sidukirima thi්rawidha hamudapathiwarun wisin sidukara nothibunu athara jenaral sarath fonseka sambandhayen ohu siragathawa sitima ha rajapaksha aandu palanaye wairayata patha්rawima nisa deshapalana washayen siduwu karyabahulathawa eeta hethuwi thibuni.jenaral sarath fonsekage idama rajayata nawatha pawara ganima pilibandawa danata helidaraw wi athi karunu anuwa thi්rawidha hamudapathiwarunta ayath mulu idamama podujana katayuththak sandaha awashya yayi sandahan karamin idam athpath kara ganime panathe 5 wani waganthiya yatathe idam ha idam sanwardhana amathi janaka bandara thennakon mahathage namin athiwishesha gasat patha්rayak magin pa්rakashayata pathkara atha.2013 warshaye okthobar masa 23 wanida anka 1833/9 washayen mema athiwishesha gasat patha්raya nikuth kara atha.

madakalapuwa dewasthanayata maragena marena bomba praharayak ella karana lada mohomad nasar mohomad asad namaththage mawage di.en.ee samanga da kolambaa kinsbari hotalayata maragena marena bomba praharayak ella kala mohomad asam mohomad mubarak namathage biriyage ha daruwage di.en.ee samanga sasandena bawata thahawuru kara thibena bawa pawasu ee mahatha dematagoda, mahawila udyanaye niwese pipirim dekak sidu wu athara eya pupuruwa gena thibenne mohomad fathima jifri namaththiya bawada aya shangrila hotalaye bomba pupuruwa gath mohomad eebrahim ilham namaththage biriya bawatath dematagoda niwese bomba pupuruwa ganimen jiwithakshayata pathwu daruwan thidena owunge daruwan bawatath rajaye rasa parikshaka departhamenthuwa thahawuru kara thibena bawada penwa dunneya.
